Definition.WordDefinition: RECONSIDER, v. To seek a justification for a decision already made.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Reconsider \Re`con*sid"er\ (r?`k?n*s?d"?r), v. t. 1. To consider again; as, to reconsider a subject. [1913 Webster]
2. (Parliamentary Practice) To take up for renewed consideration, as a motion or a vote which has been previously acted upon. [1913 Webster]

reconsider v 1: consider again; give new consideration to; usually with a view to changing; "Won't you reconsider your decision?" 2: consider again (a bill) that had been voted upon before, in legislation
